slam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.edge_factory_ABC module

class slam.frontend_manager.edge_factories.edge_factory_ABC.EdgeFactory(config: EdgeFactoryConfig)[source]

Bases: ABC, Generic[GraphEdge, GraphVertex]

Abstract factory for creating edges.

__init__(config: EdgeFactoryConfig)[source]
Parameters:

config – configuration of the factory.

property name: str

Unique name of the factory.

abstract property vertices_types: set[type[GraphVertex]]

Types of the used vertices.

Returns:

set of vertices types.

abstract property base_vertices_types: set[type[Pose3 | Rot3 | ndarray[Any, dtype[float64]] | NavState | ConstantBias]]

Types of the used base (GTSAM) instances.

Returns:

set of base vertices types.

abstract create(graph: Graph, vertices: Collection[GraphVertex], measurements: OrderedSet[Measurement]) → list[GraphEdge][source]

Creates new edges from the measurements.

Parameters:

  • graph – the graph to create edges for.

  • vertices – graph vertices to be used for new edges.

  • measurements – measurements from different handlers.

Returns:

new edges.

Creates new edges from the given measurements. :param graph: the main graph. :type graph: Graph :param vertices: graph vertices to be used for new edges. :type vertices: Iterable[GraphVertex] :param measurements: measurements from different handlers. :type measurements: OrderedSet[Measurement]

create(graph: Graph, vertices: Collection[LidarPose], measurements: OrderedSet[Measurement]) → list[LidarOdometry][source]

Creates 1 edge (LidarOdometry) with the given measurements.

Parameters:

  • graph – the graph to create the edge for.

  • vertices – graph vertices to be used for the new edge.

  • measurements – contains SE(3) transformation matrix.

Returns:

list with 1 edge.

static _create_vertex(index: int, timestamp: int) → LidarPose[source]

Creates the graph vertex.

Parameters:

  • index – index of the vertex.

  • timestamp – timestamp of the vertex.

Returns:

vertex.

static _create_factor(vertex1_id: int, vertex2_id: int, measurement: Measurement, noise_model: Sigmas) → BetweenFactorPose3[source]

Creates the GTSAM factor for the factor graph.

Parameters:

  • vertex1_id – id of the first vertex.

  • vertex2_id – id of the second vertex.

  • measurement – a measurement with values: transformation matrix SE(3).

  • noise_model – GTSAM noise model.

Returns:

GTSAM factor.

_get_previous_vertex(storage: VertexStorage, timestamp: int, index: int) → LidarPose[source]

Gets previous vertex if found or creates a new one.

Parameters:

  • storage – storage of vertices.

  • timestamp – timestamp of the vertex.

  • index – index of the vertex.

Returns:

vertex.

_create_edge(vertex1: LidarPose, vertex2: LidarPose, measurement: Measurement) → LidarOdometry[source]

Creates an edge.

Parameters:

  • vertex1 – first vertex.

  • vertex2 – second vertex.

  • measurement – a measurement with the transformation matrix SE(3).

Returns:

new edge.
